author: Fox News - By Thomas Catenacci
title: Judiciary Chair Jim Jordan does victory lap after massive banks exit $68 trillion UN climate alliance | Flipboard
text: Judiciary Chair Jim Jordan does victory lap after massive banks exit $68 trillion UN climate alliance EXCLUSIVE: House Judiciary Chair Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, cheered the news that multiple major U.S. banks and financial institutions are leaving a $68 trillion climate alliance founded at the United Nations.
